mapper.sql: id, hosp_code, insure_reg_code, medicine_org_code, clr_type, clr_way, setlym, psntime, medfee_sumamt, med_sumfee, fund_appy_sum, cash_payamt, acct_pay, begndate, enddate, is_declare, declare_time, declare_name, clr_appy_evt_id, crte_name, crte_id, crte_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO insure_unified_reckon ( id, hosp_code, insure_reg_code, medicine_org_code, clr_type, clr_way, setlym, psntime, medfee_sumamt, med_sumfee, fund_appy_sum, cash_payamt, acct_pay, begndate, enddate, is_declare, declare_time, declare_name, clr_appy_evt_id, crte_name, crte_id, crte_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{hospCode}, #{insureRegCode}, #{medicineOrgCode}, #{clrType}, #{clrWay}, #{setlym}, #{psntime}, #{medfeeSumamt}, #{medSumfee}, #{fundAppySum}, #{cashPayamt}, #{acctPay}, #{begndate}, #{enddate}, #{isDeclare}, #{declareTime}, #{declareName}, #{clrAppyEvtId}, #{crteName}, #{crteId}, #{crteTime} )

INSERT INTO insure_unified_reckon ( id, hosp_code, insure_reg_code, medicine_org_code, clr_type, clr_way, setlym, psntime, medfee_sumamt, med_sumfee, fund_appy_sum, cash_payamt, acct_pay, begndate, enddate, is_declare, declare_time, declare_name, clr_appy_evt_id, crte_name, crte_id, crte_time ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.hospCode}, #{item.insureRegCode}, #{item.medicineOrgCode}, #{item.clrType}, #{item.clrWay}, #{item.setlym}, #{item.psntime}, #{item.medfeeSumamt}, #{item.medSumfee}, #{item.fundAppySum}, #{item.cashPayamt}, #{item.acctPay}, #{item.begndate}, #{item.enddate}, #{item.isDeclare}, #{item.declareTime}, #{item.declareName}, #{item.clrAppyEvtId}, #{item.crteName}, #{item.crteId}, #{item.crteTime} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE insure_unified_reckon
insure_reg_code = #{insureRegCode},
medicine_org_code = #{medicineOrgCode},
clr_type = #{clrType},
clr_way = #{clrWay},
setlym = #{setlym},
psntime = #{psntime},
medfee_sumamt = #{medfeeSumamt},
med_sumfee = #{medSumfee},
fund_appy_sum = #{fundAppySum},
cash_payamt = #{cashPayamt},
acct_pay = #{acctPay},
begndate = #{begndate},
enddate = #{enddate},
is_declare = #{isDeclare},
declare_time = #{declareTime},
declare_name = #{declareName},
clr_appy_evt_id = #{clrAppyEvtId},
crte_name = #{crteName},
crte_id = #{crteId},
crte_time = #{crteTime}
WHERE id = #{id} and hosp_code = #{hospCode}

update.foreach:
UPDATE insure_unified_reckon
hosp_code = #{item.hospCode},
insure_reg_code = #{item.insureRegCode},
medicine_org_code = #{item.medicineOrgCode},
clr_type = #{item.clrType},
clr_way = #{item.clrWay},
setlym = #{item.setlym},
psntime = #{item.psntime},
medfee_sumamt = #{item.medfeeSumamt},
med_sumfee = #{item.medSumfee},
fund_appy_sum = #{item.fundAppySum},
cash_payamt = #{item.cashPayamt},
acct_pay = #{item.acctPay},
begndate = #{item.begndate},
enddate = #{item.enddate},
is_declare = #{item.isDeclare},
declare_time = #{item.declareTime},
declare_name = #{item.declareName},
clr_appy_evt_id = #{item.clrAppyEvtId},
crte_name = #{item.crteName},
crte_id = #{item.crteId},
crte_time = #{item.crteTime}
WHERE id = #{item.id}

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM insure_unified_reckon WHERE id = #{id} and hosp_code = #{hospCode}

DELETE FROM insure_unified_reckon WHERE id IN
#{id}
